books.title: Trent’s Last Case
books.author: E. C. Bentley
books.summary: A journalist investigates the murder of a Wall Street kingpin.

books.title: Running a Thousand Miles for Freedom
books.author: William Craft
books.summary: The authors escape from slavery by posing as a slaveowner and his slave.

books.title: The Story of My Life
books.author: Helen Keller
books.summary: Helen Keller writes about her experiences as a deafblind child learning to communicate.

books.title: Queen Victoria
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: A sardonic and generally unflattering biography of Victoria Alexandrina, Queen of England.

books.title: The Phoenix and the Carpet
books.author: E. Nesbit
books.summary: Five children once again encounter an ancient, magical creature and go on adventures around the world with its magic carpet.

books.title: A Damsel in Distress
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: A composer meets a young woman and tracks her down to a country manor, where a case of mistaken identity leads to comedy.

books.title: A Midsummer Night’s Dream
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: This comedy follows four lovers and a thespian who become bewitched by fairies.

books.title: The Book of Wonder
books.author: Lord Dunsany
books.summary: A collection of fantastical short stories.

books.title: Tarzan, Lord of the Jungle
books.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
books.summary: Journeys, times, and cultures collide as two expeditions seek the riches of known and fabeled lands.

books.title: The Magician
books.author: W. Somerset Maugham
books.summary: A young engaged couple meet a mysterious man who claims to have practical knowledge of the occult.

books.title: The Story of My Experiments with Truth
books.author: Mahatma Gandhi
books.summary: Gandhi relates his life experiences from his birth in Gujarat in 1869 through the Indian National Congress of 1915.

books.title: The Crimson Circle
books.author: Edgar Wallace
books.summary: A police inspector and an unusual private detective investigate a devious blackmail plot.

books.title: Polynesian Mythology
books.author: George Grey
books.summary: A collection of Māori mythology covering the start of the universe through to the spread of Māori tribes through New Zealand’s North Island.

books.title: A General View of Positivism
books.author: Auguste Comte
books.summary: A brief overview of the goals and methods of the Positivist philosophical movement.

books.title: Metamorphoses
books.author: Ovid
books.summary: A collection of Greek and Roman myths that involve various forms of transformation.

books.title: A Woman of No Importance
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.summary: A mother’s secretive past clashes with high society when her son is offered an irresistible position with a charismatic nobleman.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Algis Budrys
books.summary: Science fiction short stories by author Algis Budrys.

books.title: Fables
books.author: Aesop
books.summary: Aesop’s classic Fables of behavior and consequence.

books.title: Unspoken Sermons
books.author: George MacDonald
books.summary: George MacDonald presents a set of interlocking sermons designed to shape the perception and life of the Christian disciple.

books.title: South!
books.author: Ernest Shackleton
books.summary: A British expedition sets off to cross Antarctica, but when their ship is wrecked they have to face a long struggle for survival.
